physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Ocular metastases in patients 1 (orbital mass), 2 (eyelid deposits), 3 (choroidal deposits), 4 (no obvious lesion), 5 (choroidal deposits), 6 (choroidal deposits).
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient 3 experienced improvement after chemotherapy resulting in regression of choroidal lesions. Patient 5 showed substantial shrinkage of hepatic lesions but no clinical improvement of the ocular lesion until treated with external radiotherapy, leading to regression of the choroidal metastasis.
